pkgmetadata.longdescription: Data Files and Functions Accompanying the Book "Bayesian Data Analysis in Ecology using R, BUGS and Stan" // Data files and functions accompanying the book Korner-Nievergelt, Roth, von Felten, Guelat, Almasi, Korner-Nievergelt (2015) "Bayesian Data Analysis in Ecology using R, BUGS and Stan", Elsevier, New York.
